title: dAham taNittiDuvAi
sahitya:
dAham taNittiDuvAi (mana) en tAi tandaiyAna dayAparat-tEnE


anupallavi

  dEhAdikk-eTTAda bhOgam pusittu shuddha yOga sutaiyaLitten uLLE amudUra


caraNam 1    paTraTra kATraip-pOlE shuTrik-kaDamai sheidu pAyum aruvi pOlap-pArukk-udavi nidam
    caraNam 2    kaTra kalaigaLukkum eTTAk-kani pizhindu karuNaiyAl nIyaLikkak-kAdalAl 
nAnarundik-kaNNADi uL nADip-paN pADik-kalandiDum dAham taNindiDuvAi
